objects.text:
Premium chrome-plated design • Smooth-rolling wheels • Ideal for makeup essentials
Portable & versatile • Space-saving dimensions • Easy to clean metal surface

product_details.name: Mini Shopping Cart Makeup Organizer - Chic Cosmetic Storage Solution
product_details.description:
• Unique miniature shopping cart design adds a playful, decorative touch to your vanity
• Premium chrome-plated metal construction ensures durability and long-lasting shine
• Portable size perfect for storing makeup essentials and beauty tools
• Smooth-rolling wheels for easy mobility across surfaces
• Versatile storage solution for cosmetics, brushes, and beauty products
• Open basket design allows quick access and visibility of all items
• Ideal gift for makeup enthusiasts and beauty lovers
• Space-saving dimensions suitable for vanity tops and bathroom counters
• Easy to clean and maintain with wipeable metal surface
• Multi-purpose use - can also store office supplies or craft materials

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant promotional design on a soft radial-gradient background transitioning from pastel pink to lavender, with layered horizontal white stripes and faint concentric circles for added depth. The header section includes a bold text layer with ID `heading` centered near the top in a large dark purple font, followed by a subtitle with ID `subheading` in a slightly smaller serif typeface for a premium feel. At the center is a product image represented by the ID `product_image`, showing a small chrome shopping cart filled with cosmetic items. Below this, a multi-line feature highlight text with ID `description` explains product benefits in a stylish font. The price is prominently displayed in bold characters using text layer `price`. A contrasting call-to-action button, consisting of a dark rounded rectangle (`cta_background`) and overlaid text (`cta`), invites users to take action.

**Color Palette:**
- Lavender (#f5d0fe)
- Light Purple (#c084fc)
- Deep Plum (#4a1e5f)
- Soft White (#ffffff)
- Shadow Violet (#3e1149)
product_color: The product image showcases a colorful assortment of cosmetics in a miniature metallic shopping cart, effectively highlighting key aesthetic elements. The visual palette includes vibrant pinks from the blush case (#F78DA7), bold blues from eyeliners and packaging (#0074D9), sleek black from mascara and foundation bottles (#1A1A1A), and beige from foundation tubes (#F2D2B3). The chrome cart adds a polished silver (#C0C0C0) that reflects and contrasts other hues stylishly. These colors are used in combination, yet standalone vibrancy ensures each product’s visibility. This fusion creates a dynamic, eye-catching layout—ideal for banners targeting beauty-conscious audiences with a chic, modern aesthetic.
